sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User } from '../services/auth'; import APITest from './APITest'; import './Dashboard.css'; interface DashboardProps { user: User; onLogout: () => void; } const Dashboard: React.FC = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'dashboard' | 'api-test'>('dashboard'); const renderContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'api-test': return ; case 'dashboard': default: return (

How can we help you today?

System Status

Google Authentication: Connected
Location Services: Pending Setup
Healthcare API: Pending Integration
); } }; return (

Welcome, {user.name}!

{user.email}

{renderContent()}
); }; export default Dashboard;
